ExtendedSection.Title: Methods for dealing with source sets (incomplete)

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Adds the image bean {ib2} to the source set stored in the image bean ib. You can use this setter in EL as follows:
    <c:set target="${ib}" property="srcSets" value="${ib.scaleWidth[250]}" />
to add a scaled version of the current image wrapped by the current bean to the source set.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The correct source set entry for the currently wrapped image as string, i.e., "{image url} {image width}w".

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The source set wrapped by the image bean as string in the format required by the srcset attribute of the <img> tag.
